verses.name: Ezekiel 45:8
verses.text: In the land shall be his possession in Israel: and my princes shall no more oppress my people; and the rest of the land shall they give to the house of Israel according to their tribes.

verses.name: Ezekiel 45:9
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord God; Let it suffice you, O princes of Israel: remove violence and spoil, and execute judgment and justice, take away your exactions from my people, saith the Lord God.

verses.name: Ezekiel 45:10
verses.text: Ye shall have just balances, and a just ephah, and a just bath.
